title: Forkful
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Build your own wrap, pasta,  rice, or salad dish with pita chips, hummus or salsa and fountain drink for $8.36 (price as of May 2013). Offers many vegan add-ons such as lemon-basil tofu, sauteed veggies, black bean salsa, hummus, black eyed pea salad, tons of fresh veggies. Often offers vegan soup du jour; any specials are marked vegan/gluten-free if applicable. Staff very knowledgeable about what is vegan/GF.
